ingredients: oil, onion chopped, garlic cloves, minced ginger, minced meat (lamb, chicken, goat, beef), tomatoes chopped finely, salt, cumin, ground coriander, red chilli powder, garam masala, coriander (optional), green chilli (optional), julienned ginger (optional)

ingredients: medium onion diced finely, garlic paste, boneless chicken, coarsely ground black pepper, salt, cumin powder, coriander powder, full fat yogurt, fresh coriander, green chilli
description: This tasty and easy recipe comes together using simple ingredients, yet packs a delicious punch of black pepper flavour. A quick and satisfying dish!
recipe_steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté finely diced onions until golden. Add garlic paste and cook briefly. Add boneless chicken and fry until lightly browned. Season with salt, cumin powder, coriander powder, and coarsely ground black pepper. Mix well. Add full-fat yogurt, stir thoroughly, and simmer on low heat

ingredients: Potato, peas, chillies, ginger, garam masala, garlic
description: A North Indian curry of potatoes and green peas cooked in a tomato-onion gravy.
recipe_steps: Cook potatoes and peas in a spiced tomato-onion gravy until soft.

ingredients: Potato, fenugreek leaves, chillies, salt, oil
description: A dry curry made with potatoes and fresh fenugreek leaves
recipe_steps: Sauté potatoes with cumin and spices, add methi leaves, and cook till tender

ingredients: Potato, shimla mirch, garam masala, amchur powder, salt
description: Stir-fried potato and capsicum dish with Indian spices.
recipe_steps: Stir-fry potatoes and capsicum with Indian spices until cooked through.

ingredients: Chole, rava, yogurt, plain flour, baking soda
description: A deep-fried, fluffy Indian bread usually served with chole.
recipe_steps: Prepare soft flour-yogurt dough, roll into discs, and deep fry till puffed.
